headline: Akamai and VAST Data Working to Usher in the Era of Edge AI Inference
summary: Akamai Technologies (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced it has entered into an agreement with VAST Data, the AI data platform company, to make data-intensive AI inferencing faster and more efficient.
